alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Davidson and western Randolph Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lexington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... High Point, Asheboro, Lexington, Randleman, Thomasville, Linwood, Trinity, Denton, Gordontown and Randleman Regional Reservior Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
